title: 💩 My Application Isn’t Submitting
description: Are you shore? Take a second look at your application and be sure you’ve filled out all the required fields. Also check for any error messages!

title: 😧 I Made A Mistake On My Application
description: It happens! Send us an email to [upe@fiu.edu](mailto:upe@fiu.edu) and we’ll get it sorted right away!

title: 🐞 I Found A Bug
description: Oof... Our junior developers did it again! Feel free to [open an issue](https://github.com/UPE-FIU/Shell/issues/new) on our GitHub and we’ll get to work!

title: 🧐 I Have Questions
description: Contact us on our [Discord server](https://discord.gg/upefiu) or send us an email to [upe@fiu.edu](mailto:upe@fiu.edu)
